https://www.artstation.com/jessibean
This is a link to the artist she is called Jessica Oyhenart, Give the artists credit next time.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Wait, she's a legit Rito employee.
Then the skin might actually be made this year.

> [{quoted}](name=dame the great,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=tzBbFaqr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-05T08:17:14.401+0000)
>
> https://www.artstation.com/jessibean
> This is a link to the artist she is called Jessica Oyhenart, Give the artists credit next time.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

As a note, do not post other artists materials here, because Riot has stated they CANNOT and WILL NOT use ideas unless they come from the source, because they've written a clause in the TOU that allows them to use fan submitted ideas - if the owner submits them. If you are not the owner of the material you're submitting, you're not being just to the owner, and you're getting nowhere because Riot can't actually touch the material.
Didnt know who it was, emotes also come off as pretty sassy which annoys me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Sorry i just don't like it when artists don't get the credit they deserve.{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
